snippet: The Mets released Young in August and he debuted with the Yankees in September, homering in three straight games.
abstract: New York Yankees sign outfielder Chris Young to one-year contract.
lead_paragraph: The Mets released Young in August and he debuted with the Yankees in September, homering in three straight games.

headline.main: Yankees Sign Outfielder Chris Young to One-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Yanks Sign Outfielder to One-Year Deal
